title: Chlorophyte armor
summaries: Chlorophyte armor is a Hardmode armor set available after defeating all three mechanical bosses. It can be considered a partial upgrade of Hallowed armor, granting more defense and being geared more towards high ranged and magic damage output.
Equipping the full set causes a Leaf Crystal to permanently appear over the player's head, automatically attacking enemies via a ranged projectile that costs no mana or ammunition.

• On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the Leaf Crystal's projectile is a green, laser-like bolt of energy that instantaneously hits its target and deals 100 base damage and inflicts a knockback of 10 (Extremely strong).
  • On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, the projectile is a green leaf that travels from the Leaf Crystal to the target. It deals (Old-gen console version) 50 / (3DS version) 40 base damage and inflicts a knockback of (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 5 (Average).

A full set of Chlorophyte armor requires 54 Chlorophyte Bars, or (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 270 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 324 Chlorophyte Ore. Crafting the full set with every helmet type requires 78 bars ((Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 390 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 468 ore).
